#summary Some comments to embedded VideoPlayer.
#labels Featured

=Introduction=

Embedded VideoPLayer supports varios formats of Video/Audio files.

For decoding audio/video streams it reques external audio/video decoders. Video Player was tested with [http://codecguide.com/download_kl.htm K-Lite Codec Pack]

=Fatures=
  * Suport Varios Audio/Video Fromats (mkv(AVC),avi,mp4,mp3,flac)
  * Playing not completely downloaded files
  * Auto-playing next file in folder
  * Playing video/audio from urls.
